title: Dragonborn
entryLore: Dragonborn are proud humanoids whose lineage traces back to draconic progenitors. Whether blessed by dragon gods or created by dragons themselves, they carry the elemental power of their ancestors in their breath and spirit. They are known for their honorable culture and their striking physical appearanceâ€”tall, strong, and covered in scales that match the hue of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: When you take the [[attack_action|Attack]] action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of magical energy. The damage type and shape of this exhalation are determined by your [[draconic_ancestry|Draconic Ancestry]]. Each creature in that area must make a [[saving_throw|Saving Throw]] (DC = 8 + your Constitution modifier + your [[proficiency_bonus|Proficiency Bonus]]). On a failed save, a creature takes 1d10 damage of the associated type, or half as much damage on a successful one. This damage increases by 1d10 at 5th, 11th, and 17th level.

traits.name: Draconic Resistance
traits.description: You have [[resistance|Resistance]] to the damage type associated with your [[draconic_ancestry|Draconic Ancestry]].

traits.name: Draconic Flight
traits.description: Starting at 5th level, you can use a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]] to manifest spectral wings for 10 minutes or until you're [[incapacitated_condition|Incapacitated]] or you dismiss them as a bonus action. While the wings are present, you have a [[speed_fly|Flying Speed]] equal to your walking speed. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]].

### Draconic Ancestries
Your draconic heritage determines the type of elemental power you command. Choose one of the following ancestries:

*   [[black_dragonborn|Black (Acid)]]
*   [[blue_dragonborn|Blue (Lightning)]]
*   [[brass_dragonborn|Brass (Fire)]]
*   [[bronze_dragonborn|Bronze (Lightning)]]
*   [[copper_dragonborn|Copper (Acid)]]
*   [[gold_dragonborn|Gold (Fire)]]
*   [[green_dragonborn|Green (Poison)]]
*   [[red_dragonborn|Red (Fire)]]
*   [[silver_dragonborn|Silver (Cold)]]
*   [[white_dragonborn|White (Cold)]]
